Address.label: Address
Address.value: 2510 14TH STREET,HANCOCK WHITNEY PLAZA, GULFPORT, Mississippi, 39501, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Hancock Whitney Corp operates bank offices and financial centers. The company offers financial products and services, including traditional and online banking; commercial and small business banking; private banking; trust and investment services; healthcare banking; certain insurance services; and mortgage services. It also operates a loan production office in Nashville, Tennessee.

value.name: D. Shane Loper
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Senior Executive VP
